trans-unit.source: Minimum requirements for using Business Central| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Minimum requirements for using Business Central| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Minimální požadavky na použití Business Cental | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about the minimum system and version requirements for using Business Central.

seg-source.mrk: Learn about the minimum system and version requirements for using Business Central.

target.mrk: Dozvěďte se více o minimálních požadavcích na systém a verzi pro použití produktu Business Central.

trans-unit.source: Minimum Requirements for Using Business Central

seg-source.mrk: Minimum Requirements for Using Business Central

target.mrk: Minimální požadavky na používání Business Central

trans-unit.source: Before you access [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], we recommend that you verify that your computer or mobile device meets or exceeds the minimum system requirements for the product.

seg-source.mrk: Before you access [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], we recommend that you verify that your computer or mobile device meets or exceeds the minimum system requirements for the product.

target.mrk: Před přístupem do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] doporučujeme ověřit, zda váš počítač nebo mobilní zařízení splňuje nebo překračuje minimální systémové požadavky na produkt.

trans-unit.source: This article lists the requirements.

seg-source.mrk: This article lists the requirements.

target.mrk: V tomto článku jsou uvedeny požadavky.

trans-unit.source: Browsers

seg-source.mrk: Browsers

target.mrk: Prohlížeče

trans-unit.source: **Chrome for Windows and Firefox for Windows:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is designed to work with the current version of these desktop browsers.

seg-source.mrk: Chrome for Windows and Firefox for Windows:
is designed to work with the current version of these desktop browsers.

target.mrk: Chrome pro Windows a Firefox pro Windows:
je navržen tak, aby pracoval s aktuální verzí těchto prohlížečů stolních počítačů.

trans-unit.source: **Safari:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is designed to work with the current version of Safari on OSX.

seg-source.mrk: Safari:
is designed to work with the current version of Safari on OSX.

target.mrk: Safari:
je navržen tak, aby pracoval s aktuální verzí Safari na OSX.

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Edge:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is designed to work with the current version of Microsoft Edge.

seg-source.mrk: Microsoft Edge:
is designed to work with the current version of Microsoft Edge.

target.mrk: Microsoft Edge:
je navržen tak, aby pracoval s aktuální verzí Microsoft Edge.

trans-unit.source: **Internet Explorer:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is designed to work with Internet Explorer 11 (build 11.0.9600.17239) for Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit versions).

seg-source.mrk: Internet Explorer:
is designed to work with Internet Explorer 11 (build 11.0.9600.17239) for Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit versions).

target.mrk: Internet Explorer:
je navržen tak, aby pracoval s aktuální verzí Internet Explorer 11 (build 11.0.9600.17239) pro Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit verze).

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you upgrade to the latest version of Internet Explorer supported for your version of Windows.

seg-source.mrk: We recommend that you upgrade to the latest version of Internet Explorer supported for your version of Windows.

target.mrk: Doporučujeme upgradovat na nejnovější verzi aplikace Internet Explorer podporovanou pro vaši verzi systému Windows.

trans-unit.source: Mobile devices

seg-source.mrk: Mobile devices

target.mrk: Mobilní zařízení:

trans-unit.source: **Windows:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] for Windows can be installed on devices with at least 1GB of RAM and Windows 10 Home, Pro, Enterprise, or Education (32-bit and 64-bit editions).

seg-source.mrk: Windows:
for Windows can be installed on devices with at least 1GB of RAM and Windows 10 Home, Pro, Enterprise, or Education (32-bit and 64-bit editions).

target.mrk: Windows:
pro Windows lze nainstalovat na zařízení s alespoň 1 GB RAM a Windows 10 Home, Pro, Enterprise nebo Education (32bitové a 64bitové edice).

trans-unit.source: **iOS:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] for iPad and iPhone requires iOS 10.0 or later.

seg-source.mrk: iOS:
for iPad and iPhone requires iOS 10.0 or later.

target.mrk: iOS:
pro iPad a iPhone vyžaduje iOS 10.0 nebo novější.

trans-unit.source: **Android:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] for Android tablet and Android phone can be installed on devices with at least 1GB of RAM and Android 6.0 or higher.

seg-source.mrk: Android:
for Android tablet and Android phone can be installed on devices with at least 1GB of RAM and Android 6.0 or higher.

target.mrk: Andriod:
pro tablety s Androidem a telefony s Androidem lze nainstalovat do zařízení s alespoň 1 GB RAM a Android 6.0 nebo vyšší.

trans-unit.source: **Device size:** [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is supported on smartphones with a minimum screen size of 4” and tablets with a minimum screen size of 7”.

seg-source.mrk: Device size:
is supported on smartphones with a minimum screen size of 4” and tablets with a minimum screen size of 7”.

target.mrk: Velikost zařízení:
je podporována na chytrých telefonech s minimální velikostí obrazovky 4 ”a tabletech s minimální velikostí obrazovky 7”.

trans-unit.source: Outlook

seg-source.mrk: Outlook

target.mrk: Outlook

trans-unit.source: **Outlook applications:** To use [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your business inbox in Outlook, you will need Outlook 2016 or later, Outlook Web App, OWA for iPhone, OWA for iPad, or OWA for Android.

seg-source.mrk: Outlook applications:
To use [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your business inbox in Outlook, you will need Outlook 2016 or later, Outlook Web App, OWA for iPhone, OWA for iPad, or OWA for Android.

target.mrk: Outlook Aplikace:

Chcete-li používat [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako svou obchodní schránku v aplikaci Outlook, budete potřebovat aplikaci Outlook 2016 nebo novější, aplikaci Outlook Web App, OWA pro iPhone, OWA pro iPad nebo OWA pro Android.

trans-unit.source: **Browsers:** When using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your business inbox in the Outlook Web App (OWA), the add-in requires that your computer is running one of the listed supported browsers that are listed earlier in this article.

seg-source.mrk: Browsers:

When using [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as your business inbox in the Outlook Web App (OWA), the add-in requires that your computer is running one of the listed supported browsers that are listed earlier in this article.

target.mrk: Prohlížeče:

Při použití [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako podnikové doručené pošty v aplikaci Outlook Web App (OWA) vyžaduje doplněk, aby počítač používal jeden z uvedených podporovaných prohlížečů, které jsou uvedeny dříve v tomto článku.

trans-unit.source: **Platforms:** When using the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Outlook Add-In in OWA for iPhone, OWA for iPad, and OWA for Android, the add-in requires that your mobile device is running one of the listed supported mobile devices for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Platforms:

When using the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Outlook Add-In in OWA for iPhone, OWA for iPad, and OWA for Android, the add-in requires that your mobile device is running one of the listed supported mobile devices for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Platformy:

Při použití [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] doplňku Outlook v OWA pro iPhone, OWA pro iPad a OWA pro Android vyžaduje doplněk, aby vaše mobilní zařízení používalo jedno z uvedených podporovaných mobilních zařízení pro [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Excel

seg-source.mrk: Excel

target.mrk: Excel

trans-unit.source: **Edit in Excel:** To use the Excel add-in to make changes in Excel and push the changes back into [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you need Excel 2016 or later.

seg-source.mrk: Edit in Excel:
To use the Excel add-in to make changes in Excel and push the changes back into [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you need Excel 2016 or later.

target.mrk: Editace v aplikaci Excel:
Chcete-li pomocí doplňku Excel provést změny v aplikaci Excel a nahrát změny zpět do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], potřebujete Excel 2016 nebo novější.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Analyzing Financial Statements in Microsoft Excel](finance-analyze-excel.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Analyzing Financial Statements in Microsoft Excel](finance-analyze-excel.md).

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete v části [Analýza finančních výkazů v aplikaci Microsoft Excel.](finance-analyze-excel.md).
